sauber.title: SAUBER
sauber.subtitle: — a home that feels light, healthy, and ready for life.
sauber.p1: Failure to regularly clean your home leads to built-up clutter, allergens, increased health risks, and a space that simply feels uncomfortable. Life in your own home becomes stressful — not to mention inviting family or friends. But most people don’t have the time, experience, or energy to manage this chore — we get it!

p3.after: to meet your specific needs and keep your home permanently clean. You decide how often and what you want cleaned. We use eco-friendly cleaning products and are properly equipped to deliver a spotless, refreshed result every time.

sicher.title: SICHER
sicher.subtitle: — trust you can verify, not just hope for.

p1.before: It can be stressful to let a stranger into your home — trust is not something given but must be gained. To guarantee your peace of mind we use
p1.strong: GoPro cameras worn by our employees throughout every cleaning session
p1.after: — you can view a live-stream video via a secure link, or review a video report later within 7 days.

p2.before: This way you are always in control and know exactly what is going on in your home even if you are not there at the time of cleaning. If anything ever feels unclear, simply review the footage and
p2.after: — we’re here to support you with complete transparency and professionalism.

p3.after: No identifying information or details of your home are shared. Only authorized personnel have access to videos, and they are deleted from our secure servers after 7 days.

souveran.title: SOUVERÄN
souveran.subtitle: — calm execution, consistent results.
souveran.p1: Every 3S-CLEAN specialist is trained, vetted, and employed directly by us — never a freelancer. That gives you reliability, accountability, and a consistent standard every time.
souveran.p2: We hire people who genuinely enjoy cleaning and take pride in doing it right. We invest in training, checklists, and a culture of ownership.

p3.after: We regularly review video reports to keep performance sharp and service reliable. And if something ever goes wrong, you’re covered: liability insurance is provided.

p4.before: There is also an economic upside for our clients: get up to
p4.strong: 20% of your annual cleaning expenditure back
p4.after: through tax reduction according to §35a EStG: keep invoices and turn routine cleaning into measurable financial efficiency.
